attributes.action: insist the car manufacturers put their resources into developing a family sized car using alternative energy sources
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it's time that the government insisted that the motor industry change their production methods as we all know the current way we fill our cars will be coming to an end, it's time the resources of the motor industry were put into use to develop a decent sized family car that is run on some type of alternate energy that won't harm the planet as we are doing now
